document_data.name: Consecration of a Glymtul
document_data.mainbody: The '''Consecration of a Glymtul''' was a religious event observed by worshipers of [[Helm]], He of the Unsleeping Eyes.
document_data.Description: This was one of the most holy ceremonies observed by the [[Church of Helm]]. The Consecration of a Glymtul was performed when a new special item of Helm's service was dedicated. The word ''glymtul'' meant "special thing."
